name: Hop2Beat
description:
HOW TO PLAY

* Tap the screen to jump and follow the music
* Try not to fall of the jump blocks
* Collect bonuses
* Complete the whole song to beat your high score

WHAT YOU GET

Simple one-touch control
Addictive gameplay
Variety of music genres
Amazing design and visual effects

Turn on the sound and challenge yourself! What is your best score?
